Aka Roach Coach

Some really odd stuff going on here -

- Guy with pneumatic rivet gun has uncovered eyes about 10 inches from the boom boom.

- Two guys feed a big sheet of stainless into the big press brake. Instead of putting the LONG side of the angle inside the brake, they put only the 1-1/2 inch lip in the brake, then turn the whole SS top upwards. That's just plain 9th grade shop stuff.

There's tons of others (welders, grinders etc). How about that chop saw cut in the early part of the video? Depending on which side of the cut was his work piece, he was either off the mark by a whole lot, or a freakin' whole lot.

Odd, it seems to me, that a company that sponsors a documentary about how THEY build something, would allow showing such clearly odd/wrong/unusual/not approved techniques.
